questions.question: a citrus fruit that is round and that has an orange skin
a usually round object that is used in a game or sport or as a toy
the clear liquid that has no color, taste, or smell, that falls from clouds as rain, that forms streams, lakes, and seas, and that is used for drinking, washing, etc.
a large natural flow of water that crosses an area of land and goes into an ocean, a lake, etc.
a thick growth of trees and bushes that covers a large area
an area of land that rises very high above the land around it and that is higher than a hill
a large wild animal that has four long thin legs, brown fur, and antlers if male
a hard usually transparent material that is used for making windows and other products
a device that is used to open a lock or start an automobileThe usual type of key is a small metal object that you insert into a narrow opening and turn.
a device that is used for protection from the rain and sun,An umbrella consists of a circle of fabric attached to a folding frame that is connected to a central pole or handle.
